com.etouch.taf.infra.mail

Class EmailInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.etouch.taf.infra.mail.EmailInfo

  • public class EmailInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    EmailInfo object carries email information including sender / recipients details.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    eTouch Systems Corporation
